message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is truly exceptional and comes with a host of features that will undoubtedly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and unique benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. I believe this represents a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire something truly special. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it. I think this is a fair price considering the product's features and quality.
